Ext.namespace("Ext.asset.prod.model");Ext.asset.prod.model.g_url="asset/prod_model.do";Ext.asset.prod.model.extWindow=Ext.extend(Ext.Window,{params:{},constructor:function(){this.form=new Ext.FormPanel({cls:"x-panel-mc",autoHeight:true,border:false,bodyStyle:"padding:5px;",labelWidth:65,items:[{xtype:"fjs-store-radio",name:"Suffix",fieldLabel:"文件类型",dictId:"system.export.excel",groupcfg:{name:"Suffix"}}]});Ext.asset.prod.model.extWindow.superclass.constructor.call(this,{iconCls:"btn-excel",title:"Excel 格式",width:320,autoHeight:true,border:false,closable:true,closeAction:"hide",modal:true,plain:true,resizable:false,items:[this.form],buttonAlign:"center",buttons:[{iconCls:"btn-accept1",text:"提交",handler:this.window_submit,scope:this},{iconCls:"btn-stop1",text:"取消",handler:this.window_close,scope:this}]})},window_close:function(){this.hide()},window_submit:function(){this.params.action="export";this.form.getForm().submit(Ext.fjs.loadAction({url:Ext.asset.prod.model.g_url,params:this.params,success:this.apply_success,scope:this}))},apply_success:function(form,opts){Ext.fjs.download("/down.php?filename="+opts.result.message);this.window_close()}});Ext.asset.prod.model.addWindow=Ext.extend(Ext.Window,{constructor:function(grid){this.grid=grid;this.form=new Ext.form.FormPanel({cls:"x-panel-mc",layout:"html",layoutConfig:{css:"fjs-form",template:"asset/prod_model.tpl"},style:"padding-top:0px",items:[{xtype:"textfield",name:"NAME",width:130,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:2,maxLength:100},{xtype:"numberfield",name:"TOTAL",width:100,allowBlank:false,allowDecimals:false,boldLabel:true,minValue:0,maxValue:10000000},{xtype:"numberfield",name:"TOALL",width:100,allowBlank:false,allowDecimals:false,boldLabel:true,minValue:0,maxValue:10000000},{xtype:"numberfield",name:"MA",width:100,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,decimalPrecision:2,minValue:0,maxValue:10000000},{xtype:"numberfield",name:"MB",width:100,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,decimalPrecision:2,minValue:0,maxValue:10000000},{xtype:"numberfield",name:"MC",width:100,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,decimalPrecision:2,minValue:0,maxValue:10000000},{xtype:"fjs-store-combo",name:"STATE",hiddenName:"STATE",width:100,allowBlank:false,allrec:false,dictId:"system.state"},{xtype:"fjs-store-combo",name:"TOFEE",hiddenName:"TOFEE",width:100,allowBlank:false,allrec:false,dictId:"system.default"},{xtype:"textarea",name:"REMARK",width:380,height:63,boldLabel:true,emptyText:"",maxLength:5000}]});Ext.asset.prod.model.addWindow.superclass.constructor.call(this,{iconCls:"btn-add",title:"产品类型",width:600,autoHeight:true,autoScroll:true,border:false,closable:true,closeAction:"hide",plain:true,modal:true,resizable:false,items:[this.form],buttonAlign:"center",buttons:[{iconCls:"btn-save",text:"提交",handler:this.window_submit,scope:this},{iconCls:"btn-stop1",text:"取消",handler:this.window_close,scope:this}]})},window_close:function(){this.hide()},window_submit:function(){if(Ext.fjs.checkValid(this.form)){this.form.getForm().submit(Ext.fjs.saveAction({url:Ext.asset.prod.model.g_url,params:{action:"save"},success:this.apply_success,scope:this}))}},apply_success:function(form,opts){this.form.getForm().reset();this.grid.refresh();this.window_close()}});Ext.asset.prod.model.modWindow=Ext.extend(Ext.Window,{constructor:function(grid){this.grid=grid;this.form=new Ext.form.FormPanel({cls:"x-panel-mc",layout:"html",layoutConfig:{css:"fjs-form",template:"asset/prod_model.tpl"},style:"padding-top:0px",items:[{xtype:"textfield",name:"NAME",width:130,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:2,maxLength:100},{xtype:"numberfield",name:"TOTAL",width:100,allowBlank:false,allowDecimals:false,boldLabel:true,minValue:0,maxValue:10000000},{xtype:"numberfield",name:"TOALL",width:100,allowBlank:false,allowDecimals:false,boldLabel:true,minValue:0,maxValue:10000000},{xtype:"numberfield",name:"MA",width:100,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,decimalPrecision:2,minValue:0,maxValue:10000000},{xtype:"numberfield",name:"MB",width:100,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,decimalPrecision:2,minValue:0,maxValue:10000000},{xtype:"numberfield",name:"MC",width:100,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,decimalPrecision:2,minValue:0,maxValue:10000000},{xtype:"fjs-store-combo",name:"STATE",hiddenName:"STATE",width:100,allowBlank:false,allrec:false,dictId:"system.state"},{xtype:"fjs-store-combo",name:"TOFEE",hiddenName:"TOFEE",width:100,allowBlank:false,allrec:false,dictId:"system.default"},{xtype:"textarea",name:"REMARK",boldLabel:true,emptyText:"",maxLength:5000,width:380,height:63}]});Ext.asset.prod.model.modWindow.superclass.constructor.call(this,{iconCls:"btn-edit",title:"产品类型",width:600,autoHeight:true,autoScroll:true,border:false,closable:true,closeAction:"hide",plain:true,modal:true,resizable:false,items:[this.form],buttonAlign:"center",buttons:[{iconCls:"btn-save",text:"提交",handler:this.window_submit,scope:this},{iconCls:"btn-stop1",text:"取消",handler:this.window_close,scope:this}]})},window_close:function(){this.hide()},window_submit:function(){if(Ext.fjs.checkValid(this.form)){this.form.getForm().submit(Ext.fjs.saveAction({url:Ext.asset.prod.model.g_url,params:{action:"save",tid:this.tid},success:this.apply_success,scope:this}))}},apply_success:function(form,opts){this.form.getForm().reset();this.grid.refresh();this.window_close()},open:function(tid){this.tid=tid;this.form.getForm().load(Ext.fjs.loadAction({url:Ext.asset.prod.model.g_url,params:{action:"getInfo",tid:tid},show:true,scope:this}))}});Ext.asset.prod.model.MainPanel=Ext.extend(Ext.grid.GridPanel,{constructor:function(){this.addBtn=new Ext.Button({iconCls:"btn-add",text:"增加",tooltip:"增加",disabled:false,handler:this.add_onclick,scope:this});this.modBtn=new Ext.Button({iconCls:"btn-edit",text:"修改",tooltip:"请选择一行",disabled:true,handler:this.mod_onclick,scope:this});this.enaBtn=new Ext.Button({iconCls:"btn-accept1",text:"启用",tooltip:"启用",disabled:true,handler:this.state_onclick,state:0,scope:this});this.disBtn=new Ext.Button({iconCls:"btn-stop1",text:"停用",tooltip:"停用",disabled:true,handler:this.state_onclick,state:1,scope:this});this.extBtn=new Ext.Button({iconCls:"btn-excel",text:"导出",tooltip:"导出",disabled:false,handler:this.export_onclick,scope:this});var sm=new Ext.grid.CheckboxSelectionModel();var cm=new Ext.grid.ColumnModel([sm,new Ext.grid.RowNumber()<s:header id="asset.prod.model"/>]);this.store=new Ext.fjs.PageStore({url:Ext.asset.prod.model.g_url,baseParams:{action:"list"},fields:[<s:fields id="asset.prod.model"/>]});this.store.load({params:{start:0,limit:Ext.fjs.defPSize}});Ext.asset.prod.model.MainPanel.superclass.constructor.call(this,{region:"center",store:this.store,stripeRows:true,autoScroll:true,boldHeader:true,closable:true,containerScroll:true,columnLines:true,cm:cm,sm:sm,loadMask:true,tbar:[this.fsel=new Ext.fjs.form.StoreComboBox({xtype:"fjs-store-combo",hiddenName:"fsel",dictId:"system.state",allowBlank:true,allrec:true,value:-1,width:85}),{xtype:"tbspacer",width:5},this.fkey=new Ext.form.TextField({xtype:"textfield",name:"fkey",width:100,maxLength:50}),{xtype:"tbspacer",width:5},{iconCls:"btn-search",tooltip:"查询",handler:this.search_onclick,scope:this},"->",this.addBtn,"-",this.modBtn,"-",this.enaBtn,"-",this.disBtn,"-",this.extBtn],bbar:Ext.fjs.PageToolBar({store:this.store})});this.getSelectionModel().on("selectionchange",this.evt_selection,this);this.on("rowdblclick",this.mod_onclick,this)},evt_selection:function(sm){var len=sm.getCount();if(len==1){this.modBtn.enable()}else{this.modBtn.disable()};if(len>=1){this.enaBtn.enable();this.disBtn.enable()}else{this.enaBtn.disable();this.disBtn.disable()}},getTid:function(){return Ext.fjs.getPKId(this,"TID")},refresh:function(){this.getBottomToolbar().doRefresh()},search_onclick:function(){var s=this.store;s.setBaseParam("STATE",this.fsel.getValue()||-1);s.setBaseParam("KEY",this.fkey.getValue());s.load({params:{start:0,limit:this.getBottomToolbar().pageSize}})},add_onclick:function(btn){var w=this.addWin;if(!w){this.addWin=w=new Ext.asset.prod.model.addWindow(this)};w.show(btn.id)},mod_onclick:function(btn){var w=this.modWin;if(!w){this.modWin=w=new Ext.asset.prod.model.modWindow(this)};w.open(this.getTid())},state_onclick:function(t){Ext.fjs.post({url:Ext.asset.prod.model.g_url,params:{action:"state",ids:this.getTid(),state:t.state},success:this.apply_success,scope:this})},apply_success:function(res,opts){var rs=Ext.decode(res.responseText);if(rs.success){this.refresh()}else{Ext.fjs.showError(rs.message)}},export_onclick:function(btn){var w=this.extWin;if(!w){this.extWin=w=new Ext.asset.prod.model.extWindow()};w.show(btn.id)},beforeDestroy:function(){if(this.addWin)Ext.destroy(this.addWin);if(this.modWin)Ext.destroy(this.modWin);if(this.extWin)Ext.destroy(this.extWin);Ext.asset.prod.model.MainPanel.superclass.beforeDestroy.call(this)}});
